website_summaries.verdict: A stylish and formal two-tone gunmetal and gold Seiko watch.
pros: Powered by solar energy and will last for months with no winding needed
cons: Requires a reset on non-31 day months

customer_reviews.title: Invalid factory warranty when purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I have had the watch for almost 2 years and now I am having a problem with it. It runs and usually keeps good time, but it must be stopping occasionally because every few days it will suddenly be off by 20 minutes or more. It is a very nice watch and still under warranty but here is the problem. The warranty is only valid if the seller fills out the “certificate of limited warranty” at the time of purchase. And guess what. Amazon did not fill out the card. So, if you buy a Seiko watch from Amazon be aware that you will not have a factory warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Billmcm

customer_reviews.title: Terribly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the watch for the first 6 months but began having increasing problems after that. It totally stopped working by 18 months and the warranty was not addressed per their own instructions that the retailer was supposed to fill out the warranty certificate. I cannot reach Seiko through Amazon as that option expired after six months. Avoid this watch. I will also avoid Seiko in in the future as well..
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey le peacock

customer_reviews.title: Seiko Service Non Responsive
customer_reviews.text: After 5 months it stopped working ,sent it to Seiko for repairs Customer Service at Seiko is terrible they had the watch for 2 weeks no one contacted me.After I contacted them,they wanted to charge me $144.00 for the repairs.I have now sent the original Invoice to get coverage under Warranty they told me that registering the watch with Seiko USA (which I did when i received the watch ) is not proof of purchase.I did not receive the watch yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy For A Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: So far, this watch is exactly what I expected, not disappointed one bit. I have had the watch for only a couple of weeks, and it's my first solar powered watch, so only time will tell if it maintains time using the solar system. I am also a scuba diver, and the 330 ft. max. depth ability helped me make up my mind, even though I only dive to max. depth of 100 ft.. I would recommend it to anyone who is interested in this type of watch. Aloha from Hawaii.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive watch in typical Sekjo styling
customer_reviews.text: First Solar watch for me. So far so good after two months. My only issue is that in low light conditions it's hard for my eyes to read sometimes. The little glow in the dark increment markings fade fairly quickly making it hard to see where the hands are. Won't miss the once in a while trip to the jeweler's to have the battery changed for $10!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kay

customer_reviews.title: replaced my last solar Seiko with this one
customer_reviews.text: I had a Seiko solar for several years. loved it. keeps very accurate time. never needs a battery banged the last one. broke the stem. Immediately re-ordered this. Slightly bigger. the fit is a little looser (has to be adjusted by removing links, I think I could make it 1/2 a link snugger). the one thing to note (not worth demoting by even 1 star): you have to have a device to remove the links if you are not a very large person. I happen to have such a device. the alternative is to take it to a jeweler, which shouldn't cost much. don't think they made that clear
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The watch has a solar battery that was not charged. I tried charging overnight but the watch stopped when removed from direct light. Watch was returned.
customer_reviews.author: D King

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read,  decent price, durable and looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product specifically because we purchased Seiko products in the past and they last a long time. My husband wanted a watch that looks professional, is rugged and hold up under daily wear and keeps time well. This watch does all that. The price was decent too and we expected to pay a little more with what we were looking for. We also ended up needing to buy a jeweler's set to remove a few band parts to get it to fit, but we've already used the set many times for different things so really no big deal. I would definitely recommend this product for price, style and wear ability!
customer_reviews.author: P. Beauch

customer_reviews.title: A Great Watch At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: The Seiko SNE098 is a great watch at a great price! The price on Amazon is considerably less than anywhere else. The watch looks to be extremely expensive, is very stylish, and perhaps, the best part is the fact that it does not require a battery. It looks great on my wrist! The charcoal face is very striking and the fact that the dials and the numbers are luminous make it very practical in a darkened room. I wholeheartedly recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Fine Watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It is stylish without being overbearing with all the dials and buttons. And never having to buy batteries is a huge plus. The listed price of $245 is a bit steep, but the Amazon price was way better and made this a very worthwhile buy. So far it keeps perfect time.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick L. Ashworth

customer_reviews.title: Nice Contrast for Older Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch. Especially like the contrast between the shiny gold hour markings and hands, versus the gray face - makes it easy to read. The band and case also seem very high quality. It is very comfortable to wear. The many reviewers that say it is a bit heavy are correct. It is 5 oz on a postal scale, versus 4 oz for my older steel Seiko (so 25% heavier), and 2 oz for a titanium Seiko (which is extraordinarily light). The bezel is a bit too shiny for my liking. But the steel on the band is more muted. So overall, it looks classy without being too 'dressy'.
customer_reviews.author: PHL 3:13-14

customer_reviews.title: Water resistance
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome watch. Two disappointing characters. Time difficult to read in the dark. Glow material not adequate. I was planning to wear it while swimming, but lack of screw down crown makes me hesitant to trust its water resistance for extended use in water.
customer_reviews.author: zatoichi

customer_reviews.title: Watch looks great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great as expected, however, when I took it to a jeweler to get links in the band removed the pins that are normally quite tight almost fell out. The clerk advised me that they wonder if some of these less expensive watches are not the quality Seikos that we usually buy, and to watch the pins carefully.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: A good watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this for a nephew who had cared for her brother in his declining years. She wanted something that would look smart, be solar powered, and have some capability of water resistance. With this Seiko she feels satisfied that he he will be very happy with it. I would have liked hands that were more visible in low light conditions, but for the price it was a good buy,
customer_reviews.author: S. Darragh

customer_reviews.title: At first it work nice but after 4 months the battery wont hold charge ...
customer_reviews.text: At first it work nice but after 4 months the battery wont hold charge and dies , very disappointed i wish i can returned or get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy30

customer_reviews.title: A super dress watch! =)
customer_reviews.text: Another great Seiko watch! very attractive and well built. the solar works great, it stays charged for a very long time. you don't need direct sunlight to make it work. all you need to do is wear the watch and go on with your normal business and the watch will charge itself automatically whenever you're outside or where light is present. simple and classy with very high detail for a basic dress watch. the stainless steel bracelet is good. a must have for watch collectors like me.
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: A little thicker and heavier than my last Seiko, but I like that it's "normal" size ... not one of these big watches that look like some gauge off an airplane or ship. My only problem with it has been that whoever put it together use too small of a wristband pin putting it together. The watch fell off my wrist twice while I was out and two other times I was able to notice it loose before it fell. Had to go to a jeweler to put the right pin in. No problem since. It's keeping good time ... has only strayed (gained) 11 seconds in two months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous and very classy watch, long in the wrist. I suggest ordering the $5.46 five-piece Watch Band Link Pin Tool Set. A local jeweler wanted almost $40 to shorten the band (by removing three or four links). I did it myself in seconds with the little kit. Seriously, save yourself the hassle and money and get the kit, even if you never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: MIke Handley

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. We bought it for my husband and he loves it. It arrived on the day promised, was packaged very well wrapped around a small pillow in a strong Seiko box. The diameter of the watch case is a little wider than we anticipated, but that's more like the current style anyway. And the watch is a little heavier than expected but may be related to its solar powered feature. All in all a very classy looking watch - can be worn both for casual as well as dress up.
customer_reviews.author: FloridianDon

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: My old Seiko finally gave out after fifteen years. It was used when I purchased it so who knows how many years it had on it before me. I also had a Seiko in the Marine Corps that lasted forever. This one is easy to read and it will probably last a long time as well. It may outlast me.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch
customer_reviews.text: My old Seiko died after many years of service. They said it could be fixed - for $140. So I found this one on Amazon for less than the repair cost of the old one. I'm delighted with this new watch. Seems to be very solid design and construction, the band is nice and easy to adjust and to snap open and closed. I like the fairly large lettering and numbers in the day and date area. Much easier to read than my old one. This watch is a keeper and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Max Remley

customer_reviews.title: Not your first choice
customer_reviews.text: Crown would not push-in flush with the case on the ones I examined. Accuracy good, lightweight watch and nice grey charcoal dial that you seldom see. EcoDrive is always fantastic; but case and bracelet design styles are dated and boring. Altogether a mediocre watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t need a lot of light to stay working.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent workmanship, tough watch and the crown doesnt pull out every time I put my hand in my pocket like my old watch did.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoung

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and convenient watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of this watch although it is a little hard to read the hands in dim lighting. The solar charging is more convenient than the kinetic Seiko I had previously. The bracelet is very well made and the clasp now has a secure button feature. Very nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality
customer_reviews.text: The weight of this watch is surprising, heavy. It's also solar, nice feature. The finish on the band is easily worn but isn't a deal breaker. Bang for the buck here is big, it beats all the "fashion" brands as a good quality watch. And it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Rider for Life

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this watch for several weeks but during that time its kept good time, looks like a more expensive watch, is light on my wrist and I have enjoyed it. So yea, I recommend it but remember I've only had it two or so weeks.
customer_reviews.author: GpK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent initial quality and workmanship. Only have had it for a week and so far, impressed with accuracy, appearance, and ease of use. Had my first Seiko when I was in the Army and have high expectations that this one will be as good as that one.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps excellent time. Best timepiece i ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Unpacked it, just what I ordered. Took it to my jeweler and she took 3 links out and set the clock, time and date. Once it was on my wrist, I don't take it off, Keeps excellent time. Best timepiece i ever bought. One can't go wrong, Buy one and see. By George
customer_reviews.author: George J. Schne

customer_reviews.title: Nice men's Watch/Solar Powered Date/Day-Date Dial
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Previous Seiko worked great but after ten years band needed replacement. Difficult to see time in low/dark lighting. Also, band lacks extra fold over clasp but clasp provided seems plenty strong with its two button release.
customer_reviews.author: beebop

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: The Seiko watch seems like a nice watch, it has a heavy weight to it and so far the solar part seems to be working. The colors and finish are perfect. The only problem so far was when I was setting the day it stuck on the Spanish word for Wednesday so after setting the time something clicked inside and then I was able to set the day. Hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Feat

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite Watch...
customer_reviews.text: This Seiko watch is beautifully designed. It may not have all of the fancy gadgets and features as other more expensive watches; but it is a very practical and exquisitely designed piece for the man who wants a nice watch, and merely needs to know the time, day and date. And being energized by a solar battery is much better than changing coin batteries year after year.
customer_reviews.author: MHM

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice look and feel on my wrist. Only had to resize the band and although the manual didn't cover that function I was able to youtube a video that pretty much walked me through the procedure. I'm really happy with the watch and look forward to years of service from this purchase. Once again, very nice price, look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Doug63026

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite watch! I love that it is solar because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite watch! I love that it is solar because some people with fitbits seem to think that watches like this are obsolete or outdated. Not so, it is solar, displays the date and day of the week with a spanish option and was very easy to remove some links for an amazing fit. Many compliments and very sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The watch I received was used, although I payed for new one.There was stain on the box.The bracelet was cut to fit, and two small pieces of bracelet was in box.There was mark of use on bracelet.I never expected like this from Amazon.Totally disappointed.Wasted my time in ordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Dr J. Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact I it uses solar to charge up ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact I it uses solar to charge up the battery and that 1 charge will last for months
customer_reviews.author: John A. Jay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same watch before and broke the band after three years usage. A new Seiko band cost half as much as the watch so I purchased another. The last watch is still keeping perfect time. I have since had the band repaired and I now use it as a work watch. Hopefully the new one will be as successful . It is a great looking watch and generate many compliments. It's durable and an excellent watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bwt5219

customer_reviews.title: Factory Seconds?
customer_reviews.text: So we ordered this watch from Amazon after checking it out at a department store. It was about $60 less on Amazon. But when we got it, it had none of the protective covering on the glass or bands, it didn't have warranty paperwork and it wouldn't charge. I don't know if this watch was previously returned or what. But I think it's probably worth the extra $60 to buy the department store watch.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboys Fan

customer_reviews.title: This watch is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in August 2016. After about the first year it began to stop on its own. Now it stops frequently. I'm pretty sure it's not a battery charging problem, because when I look at it and see that it's stopped, it starts again after I slap it. Very disappointed. I thought Seiko watches were high quality and lasted practically forever.
customer_reviews.author: Mile High

customer_reviews.title: Seiko watches last for years
customer_reviews.text: This was just like the watch he had which finally gave out after 8 or 9 years of outside abuse working with livestock. Excellent watch and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great for dress or casual
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely watch I gave to my husband for our anniversary. The two tone/gray face combination looks very classy and easily goes from casual to dressy. It's probably last year's model, so the price was incredible. It's a Seiko, so I'm glad we both like it because we'll most likely be looking at it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline K. Reece

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. He only just got it for Christmas, so I can’t speak on the longevity of it. I almost bought a mvmt watch, but the reviews were terrible, glad I got this one. It’s very nice quality and looks really classy.
customer_reviews.author: Phalanges7

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have a Seiko kinetic that I send to Seiko for maintenance about every 5 years. That watch keeps perfect time and is now 17 years old. Given that good experience I like the idea of a watch that charges its battery by motion or light so I decided to treat myself using Amazon gift cards to a new solar watch. This watch is stunningly beautiful and so far it's keeping great time. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Great Seiko quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great Seiko quality as expected. Watch is a bit heavy. Also be prepared to take links out of the band. I am a big guy and still had to take two out. Thus is my first experience with a solar watch so nothing to share about that. Watch was running when I took it out of the Ed box so that is encouraging.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and practical. Enviroment frendly with no battery
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Seiko watch. Perfect for every day use. Mind free of not to change battery ever.. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Watch to be proud of!
customer_reviews.text: On the whole this watch is a nice looking watch of good feeling guality. I would recommend it to another. I was surprised at the overall size of the watch. It fits my wrist nicely On the other hand because the crown does not screw down I am afraid of the waterproof nature of the watch in even washing my hands. Being farsighted I have a difficult time seeing the day and date. They are very small. Hope this watch lasts as long as my last Seiko - 7 years!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves the watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband at Christmas. He loves It! It's a great watch, looks great. He love the two tone look, and it is simple, but elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile accessory
customer_reviews.text: I've had the watch for a week and love it! The 39mm diameter is excellent on smaller boned individuals. It looks good with both casual and dressy attire.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I love the brands style and classic features
customer_reviews.text: My third Seiko that I have bought for myself. I love the brands style and classic features. My first Seiko lasted 23 years before I retied it. My second Seiko I had for three years but I lost out in a snow storm. The clasp was broken and needed repair and I thought I had fixed it but I guess I didn't. This third watch is going great and I love it. Seiko makes a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Lataille

customer_reviews.title: Defective watch but superb Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Much to my surprise and dismay, this watch was defective. The day of the month worked as expected but I could not set the day of the week as it seems to be hanging up or catching on something. I like all other features of the watch. What really did please me was the Amazon return procedure. I've ordered many items from Amazon over the years and this is the first item I've ever had to return. The return procedure was very easy and smooth. A big surprise was that a replacement was on the way before I sent back the defective watch. Amazon goes all out to please this customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Love it, just wish it wasn't only solar powered.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to keep it charged in a non-sunny upstate NY environment. Using house lighting for now. Tends to lose time overnight in the dark. Otherwise it has all the features I wanted and it looks fantastic! The smaller 38mm size fits my smaller wrist perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Lundgren Jr.

customer_reviews.title: solar/light powered
customer_reviews.text: Solar/Light powered watch, no winding or battery to replace. However, did not include instructions on how to resize band. Had to search the Internet for instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch for the money. Solar and pretty much 0 maintenance for years and years. Quartz accuracy. Looks great, beautiful/semi reflective silver dial with lume on hands and markers. What more can you ask for? There's also a protected crown; hacking second hand; solid bracelet links, 100m WR. The only thing that's really missing for me is perpetual calendar, but I can live with that for this price.
customer_reviews.author: howsthesky

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: looks great and is smaller and thinner than most others on the market with a 100m rating
customer_reviews.author: drifter

customer_reviews.title: Another great timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've had Seiko watches all my life and have never been disappointed. Since I was 17 so 45 years. I've had a few of them an still have a a couple left. I put a few through heavy Construction , so I'm pretty hard on them. This is my first Solar and its perfect. Works just fine as I knew it would.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: It keeps time with great precision and the calendar function works
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. I have gotten so many compliments on this watch. It keeps time with great precision and the calendar function works! I don't remember when the last time I've been able to say my day and date function kept up. Kinda hard to go wrong with Seiko anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product promptly delivered
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on-time, in original box, with warranty. The price was reasonable and the vendor fulfilled the order in the expected time-window. We will keep our business there.
customer_reviews.author: F. Costela

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Need shipping information for a return as the watch is faulty. Doesn't
customer_reviews.author: David R Herridge

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Seiko watches, although I've had many other brands through the years. I bought a Seiko solar watch (SNE098) 11 months ago and have been very satisfied with it from the first day I got it. It's kept perfect time from the start and I have had no problems with it at all. I charge it up to 10 hours of sunlight a month. It looks great, functions perfectly, and totally justifies my preference for the Seiko brand.
customer_reviews.author: Walden Jay

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of jewelry that works great. Looks more expensive than appears in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The watch looks nice and works fine
customer_reviews.text: The watch looks nice and works fine, I'd recommend it. What is not fine, is Amazon "sitting" on my order for 5 days before it was even shipped. The item was in stock when ordered. Stop trying to build value in a prime membership, like that.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good Watch but looked like a used one
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch in time. I just tested it for 3 days to assess the accuracy and so far it is accurate. However, the watch looks like a used one since the label or tag is off the watch and the box condition is quite old and it doesn't match the New condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and value.
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using the watch for a couple of weeks, but as of now I am very satisfied with the watch. Don't know about the water resistant aspect of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Wright

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Classic Seiko watch! Beautiful & stylish. This is a solar watch as well. Was found in a department store for $265, much cheaper on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, love the color
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, love the color. And like having the day of the week anrd date display. The band was a little too long, but a trip to the local jewelry store fixed that, had two links removed. Now it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Webster

customer_reviews.title: Caution, Do not expect to last beyond Warranty of 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this watch when I purchased in march of 2016. It kept precise time. However in MARCH 2019 THE Watch started to lose time of one minute per week and by July it was losing around 3 minutes a week. I contacted Seiko and they advised to send the watch in for an estimate on repair. Was I surprised when the estimate was returned and repair would cost more than i paid for the watch. Seiko advised that the warranty had expired in March 2019 and obviously I was out of Luck. I had the watch returned unrepaired .The lesson learned here, IS DO NOT EXPECT THIS WAACH TO LAST MORE THAN THE 3 YEAR WARRANTY.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. It makes a nice addition to my collection
customer_reviews.author: TG West

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish watch. I love it and at a good price made it a great buy,
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great lookingwatch
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch! The gold parts are not overly bright and just accent this beautiful watch. Only had this a few weeks but it keeps perfect time. I took it to a jewelry shop after receiving it and paid 5 dollars to have them adjust the band.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Weight of the watch
customer_reviews.text: I have a Seiko Titanium watch for many years. The crystal on the face has several scratches. That was the reason I bought another Seiko watch, compared to that present SNE098 is considerably heavier. But the look is impressive and I do not feel the weight till I am taking it off. Good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tapan D. Datta

customer_reviews.title: all was good!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. The only thing that was tricky was that he started in the middle of the day, so the date/time was not changing at midnight. Once he figured that out, all was good!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. He needed a watch really bad so I gave it to him early. He loves it. It has an illuminated dial. The band was super easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: TXPatriot

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Affordable, Modern Classic Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: This watch has the modern classic look nailed. Not too flashy, but just enough flash to look more expensive than it actually is. I have very small wrist, had to have 5 links taken out, but watch face, both depth and circumference, look just fine. Need an affordable dress watch that you can wear with either gold or silver, black or brown? This is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Love all my Seiko solars. This is a great looking watch at a great price. Keeps time perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W. Wichman

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me an almost identical Seiko watch 30 yrs ago and it lasted all this time. It's a little larger and heavier than the old one but it's easier to read. Looks good and hopefully will last as long
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Looks great and is extremely comfortable, which is exactly what I expected from this Seiko. The watch face is clean and easy to read with a quick glance. I had a similar version of this for many years that was nearly flawless. Eventually, the wear and tear of daily use prompted me to want a new one. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Coast to Coast

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: This replaces one that wore out after years of hard service. We would order it again if necessary, but expect that will be a long way in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katla

customer_reviews.title: Smart styling in a great timepiece.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I had hoped for in styling, function, and value for the price. Keeps perfect time and looks great doing it. I really like the batteryless quartz idea.
customer_reviews.author: NH Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good watch, not great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch. Good brand. The only thing I didn’t like is the luminescence. I bought it so I could see the time at night. The only problem is, the luminescence only lasts a short time and then it’s just like any non luminescent dual watch.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Fortenberry

customer_reviews.title: Simple but beautiful watch. Seems very well made as you would ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple but beautiful watch. Seems very well made as you would expect from a Seiko. Band is super big and for me, I'll need to have a watch shop adjust the band. However, I'm very pleased with my choice and the quality of my Seiko
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. McAdams

customer_reviews.title: This Seikowatch has a stunning face with glowing hands
customer_reviews.text: This Seiko watch has a stunning face with glowing hands. It's a solar watch so hopefully I will never have any problems with it dying! It's made in China but then again what's not made in China! I bought the link remover to help removing the links which made it much easier. It's a little stylish for work but loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Les Sato

customer_reviews.title: Seiko products are high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I like the appearance-comfortable band! The day/date window is large enough for senior citizen use! Have bought many Seiko products--all are good!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Solar no batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great watch good size -quality design time keeping accurate for the price great watch
customer_reviews.author: Steve P

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch. I have watches that were 300.00 plus that I don’t like nearly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Seiko watch since 1999. This one is a beautiful solar watch with nice gold accents. The $15.00 Prime discount was instrumental in my decision to order this watch. The watch was delivered with the time, day, and date already set !! I'm hoping it will last like my other 2 Seiko watches have lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Heckbek

customer_reviews.title: Love the Two-Tone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking watch. This is about my sixth Seiko. Only one had to be repaired over the years. Excellent watches.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ingram

customer_reviews.title: It keeps excellent time which I attribute to the quartz movement
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for a couple of weeks now and it has performed well. It keeps excellent time which I attribute to the quartz movement. It is the first light-powered watch I've owned and I was not sure how that would work, but so far so good. My last watch was a self-winding watch and it lost several minutes per week, but it was not a quartz watch. For the cost, this watch is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a great Japanese watch
customer_reviews.text: It is a great watch. Only thing you should know that it takes longer time to charge it first time.
customer_reviews.author: Warminster

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a similar style dress watch. I love the two-tone colors and the solar powered function. So far it seems to be very accurate with it's Japanese movement. Overall I am very pleased with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: The exact same watch in several stores was much higher. Classy & stylish - my husband likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: So far it is really wonderful experience. It was really easy to charge and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the watch since June 1st. So far it is really wonderful experience. It was really easy to charge and set the date and day of the week, just followed instructions. Wrist bend adjustments was really easy after I followed instructions on YouTube how to adjust wristband using just a paper clip. The watch is very nice looking and I hope for a long life of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: SEMYON L. ZHELEZNYAK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and super-accurate watch.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, which is super comfortable and accurate, a great combination.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Geisel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. I've gotten so many compliments about it since I've bought it. The best part is that it has the solar recharge capability, so no battery replacements are necessary.
customer_reviews.author: arvinz13

customer_reviews.title: Seiko men's watch
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his watch... Nice design and great fit.
customer_reviews.author: itelephant

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch, but somewhat hard to read in low light. My wife thought it was heavy, which it is, but doesn't feel heavy on my wrist. I like the "chunky" look.
customer_reviews.author: Harthrob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 18 year old grandson. He loves it!! Attractive, fits well and Not too flashie.
customer_reviews.author: Bettye Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Super Watch, unfortunatey  description inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The watch appears to be up to the standard expected from Seiko, simply great. However the marketting information was so inaccurate I must return it forthwith. The face appears Blue on the picture, but the watch that arrived was a matt type Black finish, and I have plenty of black faces already./ The thickness of the watch is in excess of the description, and the day/date is misfunctioning to my touch
customer_reviews.author: Chevique

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive watch!
customer_reviews.text: A quality watch for the price! Great water resistance feature!
customer_reviews.author: David  Bellissimo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but returned it because it was too big on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Kenneally

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be excellent quality. Large and rather heavy
customer_reviews.text: Product just as pictured. Seems to be excellent quality. Large and rather heavy, but that is exactly what I was expecting. I am 80 years old, and this is about my fifth Seiko watch. After one month, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: R. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Haven't had a solar watch before
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Haven't had a solar watch before, so I'll have to wait to comment on how it runs.
customer_reviews.author: Allen K. Jones

product_meta.title: Seiko Men's SNE098 Two-Tone Stainless Steel Watch
product_meta.description:
From the master craftsmen at Seiko, the Seiko Men's SNE098 Two Tone Stainless Steel Analog with Grey Dial Watch is a cutting-edge timepiece with a masculine appeal. Featuring a black analog dial and a two-tone stainless steel band, this watch is packed with style and would be a great addition to your watch collection.




From Humble beginnings, Kintaro Hattori’s Vision for Seiko has become reality. A consuming passion for excellence - imprinted in our Corporate DNA passed from generation to generation. Seiko, for 125 years committed to the art and science of time.

 A culture of innovation connects a 19th century Tokyo clock shop with 20th century advances in timekeeping to an extraordinary 21st century "quiet revolution." Continually driven by dedication and passion, established a multitude of world’s first technologies… transforming the principles of timekeeping. 

 The first quartz wristwatch – changed the history of time. 

 The first Kinetic – marked a new era in quartz watch technology. 

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement. 

 Kinetic – a quartz mechanism with unparalleled accuracy –the driving force behind more world’s firsts. 

 Kinetic Chronograph – the next generation of high performance timekeeping. 

 Kinetic Auto Relay – automatically resets to the correct time. 

 Kinetic Perpetual - combining the date perfect technology of perpetual calendar with the genius of Kinetic Auto Relay. 

 And now Kinetic Direct Drive – move, and the watch is powered automatically. Or hand wind it and see the power you are generating in real time. 

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. This dress watch has a brushed and polished two-tone, stainless steel case and bracelet which creates an elegant finish. The timepiece is constructed with a durable crystal that protects the grey dial. Lumibrite hands and day/date calendar. 100 meters water resistant.

See more

 * Product Dimensions :4.9 x 3.8 x 2.8 inches; 5 Ounces
 * Item model number :SNE098
 * Department :Male
 * Batteries :1 Product Specific batteries required.
 * Date First Available :February 19, 2011
 * Manufacturer :Seiko
 * ASIN :B004OJK2F6

 In 1969, Seiko Astron, the first quartz wristwatch - was introduced. 

 In an instant, Seiko exponentially improved the accuracy of wristwatches –And Seiko technology firmly established today’s standard in Olympic and sports timing. 

 1984, another celebrated first – Kinetic Technology – powered by body movement.

 In the realm of fine watches, time is measured by Seiko innovation – A heritage of dedication to the art and science of time.



No battery change required and powered by all types of light. Solar cell with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient movement with long power reserve. This dress watch has a brushed and polished two-tone, stainless steel case and bracelet which creates an elegant finish. The timepiece is constructed with a durable crystal that protects the grey dial. Lumibrite hands and day/date calendar. 100 meters water resistant.

feature_bullets: Two-tone watch with gunmetal sunray dial, date window, and logo at 12 o'clock
38 mm stainless steel case with hardlex dial window
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Two-tone stainless steel band featuring deployment clasp with push-button
Water resistant to 100 m (330 ft): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving.
